name: Father
description:
Adam's daughter never came home from school for Christmas. In an effort to discover her whereabouts, Adam finds himself lost in the foggy forests of Edenfell University, a mysterious college in the heart of Bavaria, known by only an elite class of strange German billionaires. As Adam fights his way through a hoard of naked cultists, he quickly learns of the horror boiling beneath the school's ancient soil.

- Explore a vast, creepy college campus.
- Fight your way through dozens of monstrous cultists.
- Gain new guns, weapons, and abilities.
- Enjoy a fast paced classic shooter inspired by Half-Life and Resident Evil.
- Uncover the mysterious history of Edenfell.
- Discover access points, skills and keys in this sprawling 3D Metroidvania.
